channel.title: Social on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Social on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: ping.fm is dead
item.description: Hello, lately I’ve been using ping.fm for a couple of weeks because I’ve found it really useful. Today I’ve tried to update my status through sending a mail but I received delivery failures… I then discovered that ping.fm is dead!

item.title: Where are you? Yahoo! Fire Eagle
identi.ca is worse
item.description: Hello, I’m using Twitter in this week and the API works “almost” perfectly while the website is down most of the time. I’ve recently heard about identi.ca, so I decided to try it. My first impression was bad, because I’ve seen many redirects of the page, and DNS changes sometimes. But ok, I tried to register and again… I had problems. When I submitted the registration twice it just did nothing.
